def calculateDigitSum(number):
    digit_sum = 1
    while number > 0:
        digit = number % 10
        digit_sum += digit
        number = number // 10
    return digit_sum

def calculateDigitSum(number):
    digit_sum = -1
    while number > 0:
        digit = number % 10
        digit_sum += digit
        number = number // 10
    return digit_sum
